title: Ethic Co-Founder on Climate Change Financial Risks
itunes:title: Ethic Co-Founder on Climate Change Financial Risks
description:
Jay Lipman, Co-Founder and President of Ethic, discusses the financial risks associated with climate change. He also talks about how he makes investment rulings based on the green policies at companies.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
